europeana:record.dc:title: New records of Fungiacava eilatensis Goreau et al., 1968 (Bivalvia, Mytilidae) boring into Indonesian mushroom corals (Scleractinia, Fungiidae)
Various articles
europeana:record.dc:creator: Hoeksema B.W.
Kleemann K.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Bivalvia
Mytilidae
Fungiacava
Scleractinia
Fungiidae
Indonesia
South Sulawesi
Bali
endoparasitism
europeana:record.dc:description: New observations on endoparasites in mushroom corals at South Sulawesi and Bali resulted in eight coral host records of the mytilid bivalve Fungiacava eilatensis Goreau et al., 1968, bringing the total to 14. The host corals were observed in various habitats, most frequently on sandy substrates. The largest numbers of parasitic bivalves (>10 individuals) were found in large attached mushroom coral hosts of the genus Podabacia.
